participant_1.background:
I am looking for a new home for me and my baby.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.
I miss my dog every day.
i like taking pictures.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.

participant_2.background:
My family are not very happy with me wearing dingy clothes.
paps likes to go mushroom hunting.
my favorite band is pink floyd.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
i just graduated high school with honors.

content.text: What was your favorite activity on your birthday?
I really enjoyed writing in my novel! I have been working on it for a while and I was really proud of what I had written.
That's awesome! What is your novel about?
It's about a girl who finds a portal to another world and has to go on an adventure to save it.
That sounds really cool! I love fantasy novels.
Me too! I've always been a big fan of fantasy books and movies.
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I would have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great choice! I love The Lord of the Rings too.
Me too! It's such a great story and the movies are so well-made.
Pink Floyd is my favorite band! I love their music and their lyrics are so deep.
I love Pink Floyd too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same music as you.
